subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Toronto Manager John Gibbons, aware of Houston’s collapse against Kansas City, used David Price in relief of R. A. Dickey against the Rangers. Price struggled, but the Blue Jays won to force Game 5.
snippet: Toronto Manager John Gibbons, aware of Houston’s collapse against Kansas City, used David Price in relief of R. A. Dickey against the Rangers. Price struggled, but the Blue Jays won to force Game 5.
